scripts.build: swagger-cli bundle -o ./build/openapi_application.yaml -t yaml ./reference/Application.v1.yaml && swagger-cli bundle -o ./build/openapi_auth.yaml -t yaml ./reference/Auth.v1.yaml && swagger-cli bundle -o ./build/openapi_enterprise.yaml -t yaml ./reference/Enterprise.v1.yaml && swagger-cli bundle -o ./build/openapi_enterprise_auth.yaml -t yaml ./reference/EnterpriseAuth.v1.yaml
